Respect.description: Be friendly and respectful to everybody. Our community is built on respect.

NSFW/Appropriate.description: Keep all content safe-for-work and appropriate. Do not post violent, distasteful or sexual content.

Channel Misuse.description: Use all channels properly. Do not send spam, excessive or unwanted messages.

Harassment.description: Do not deliberately annoy or harass other users.

Advertisement.description: Do not advertise or self-promote outside selective showcase channels.

Hate Speech.description: Do not engage in hate speech or attacks on protected categories.

Bot User.description: Bot/automated spam users are not permitted.

AI Post Spam.description: Do not flood channels with pointless AI/Chat GPT post spam.
